mapper.insert: insert into sboard ( btitle, bpass, bname, bcontent, bip) values (#{btitle}, #{bpass}, #{bname}, #{bcontent}, #{bip} )
mapper.update: update sboard set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bno=#{bno} and bpass=#{bpass}
update sboard set bhit=bhit+1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from sboard where bno=#{bno} and bpass=#{bpass}
mapper.select: select * from sboard order by bno desc;
